svcproc.title: SERVICE CHECKS
svcproc.para: The propeller shaft should be carefully inspected at each lubrication interval. Check for such things as loose yokes, universal joint wear, propeller shaft tube bends and missing slip yoke welch plugs. These items can cause vibration, or universal joint and center bearing failure.

step1.para: Check output and input end yokes at the transmission and axle for looseness ( Figure 5). If loose, remove propeller shaft and tighten to specifications. Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES, GROUP 13 - TRANSMISSION, or GROUP 14 - REAR AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for torque specifications.

figure.caption: Figure 5. Check Output and Input End Yokes For Looseness

step1.para: Check for excessive movement of end yokes at the transmission output, and axle input or output shafts in their supporting bearings ( Figure 6). Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES, GROUP 13 - TRANSMISSION, or GROUP 14 - REAR AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for limits.

figure.caption: Figure 6. Check For Excessive Movement of End Yokes, Axle Input or Output Shafts

step1.para: Check for looseness across universal joints; it should not exceed .006" (.152 mm) Figure 7).

figure.caption: Figure 7. Check For Looseness Across Universal Joints

step1.para: Check slip joint for excessive movement as shown in Figure 8, If looseness between slip yoke and tube stub shaft exceeds .012" (.305 mm), replace the slip joint.

figure.caption: Figure 8. Check Slip Joint For Excessive Movement

step1.para: Check propeller shaft for missing balance weights and dented or bent tubing. Carefully remove any foreign material from the shaft.

Welch plugs used in slip yokes should be inspected to be sure they are not loose or missing ( Figure 9). If they are, repair or replace and check slip shaft length to be sure that the tube stub shaft is not hitting the welch plug and knocking it out.
Loose center (carrier) bearing assembly mounting bolts should be tightened. Deteriorated or oil soaked center bearing insulators should be replace.
